publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5629 Mr Tom McCabe: Prostitution (Public Places) (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Prostitution (Public Places) (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: George Lyon*
S2M-5629 Mr Tom McCabe: Prostitution (Public Places) (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Prostitution (Public Places) (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: George Lyon
